headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin for LG webOS TVs
footerDisplay: For a detailed description, see the [README](https://github.com/merdok/homebridge-webos-tv#configuration-1)

ip.title: TV ip address
ip.description: The ip address of your TV.

mac.title: TV mac address
mac.description: The mac address of your TV.

broadcastAdr.title: Broadcast address
broadcastAdr.description: If homebridge runs on a host with more than one network interface use this to specify the broadcast address.

keyFile.title: Key file location
keyFile.description: The location where to store the tv key file. Default is: ~/.lgtv2/keyfile

prefsDir.title: Prefs directory
prefsDir.description: The location where to store tv information. Default is: ~/.homebridge/.webosTv

pollingInterval.title: Background polling interval
pollingInterval.description: How often to check the status of the tv in seconds.

deepDebugLog.title: Enable deep debug log.
deepDebugLog.description: Enables additional more detailed debug log. Useful when trying to figure out issues with the plugin.

hideTvService.title: Hide the TV service
hideTvService.description: Recommended when the TV already supports native HomeKit integration to prevent double TV accessories.

volumeLimit.title: Volume limit for the volume service
volumeLimit.description: Allows to limit the volume which can be set using the volume service.

volumeControl.title: Volume control service
volumeControl.description: Whether to enable additional volume control. Button - adds volume up/down buttons, Slider - adds a light bulb which acts as a volume controller.

channelControl.title: Channel control service
channelControl.description: Whether to show channel up/down buttons.

mediaControl.title: Media control service
mediaControl.description: Whether to show media control buttons.

screenControl.title: Screen control service
screenControl.description: Whether to show the screen control button. Allows to turn on/off the tv screen.

screenSaverControl.title: Screen saver control service
screenSaverControl.description: Whether to show the screen saver control button. Allows to instantly activate the screen saver on the TV. Can be used only when no content is playing on the tv.

ccRemoteRemap.title: Remap control center remote buttons
ccRemoteRemap.description: Allows to remap the control center remote buttons. For possible values check the README.

appButtons.title: App buttons
appButtons.description: Dedicated app buttons which will appear for the TV. Params needs to be added manually in the config.json

channelButtons.title: Channel buttons
channelButtons.description: Allows to create buttons for specific channels.

notificationButtons.title: Notification buttons
notificationButtons.description: Allows to create buttons that show notifications on your TV.

remoteControlButtons.title: Remote control buttons
remoteControlButtons.description: Allows to create buttons that emulate remote control presses.

remoteSequenceButtons.title: Remote sequence buttons
remoteSequenceButtons.description: Allows to create buttons that run a specified remote control sequence.

soundOutputButtons.title: Sound output buttons
soundOutputButtons.description: Allows to create buttons that can switch between sound outputs.
